nodes.text: The mutiny on the Advent was an incident that occurred around 48 BBY aboard the Advent, a cargo freighter tasked with delivering food to a famine stricken star system. A skirmish in the cargo bay of the Advent between the mutineers and two Jedi resulted in Padawan Nim Pianna's death.
The mutiny on the Advent first appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
